main event: A radio operator from San Marcos Airport in Bogata, Columbia spotted an unidentified object on August 23, 1965.
interesting points: The object changed shape from cone to elongated to square and finally half-moon shaped,The observation lasted for 33 minutes with the object initially being at a 15-degree elevation,The object was seen at an approximate altitude of 1,500 ft and was believed to be about 30 miles away,Radio operator reported a steady light outlining the object that contrasted with blinking lights of normal aircraft,The object was lost from view when it passed behind clouds after 23 minutes.
sighted object: unidentified flying object that changed shapes
witness description: radio operator at San Marcos Airport
